title: "Donald Chew" Announces Launch of Crowdfunding Campaign to Support the Development of Game Changing Device
text:
"Donald Chew" Announces Launch of Crowdfunding Campaign to Support the Development of Game Changing Device
Donald Chew launches a crowdfunding campaign to bring the worlds first truly wireless Wi-Fi and cable TV device to market. Donald Chew discusses on the indiegogo campaign how he plans to bring this game changing device to market.
Chicago, IL, October 11, 2015 --( PR.com )-- For the first time, On-Time Communications is launching its larger-than-life campaign in support of completing development of the world’s first truly wireless Wi-Fi and cable TV device called the “MOTI” that will solve the multitude of problems throughout the cable industry. On-Time Communications, dba On-Time Cable is a for profit organization dedicated to solving the problems of the cable industry, creating a viable competitor to the monopolies that exist via a common sense approach to delivering internet and cable anywhere in the world.
The MOTI device has the ability to provide wireless Wi-Fi. The MOTI device also has other features in addition to built in WI-FI, it also has a built in DVR. The most important feature is how it addresses the customer service issue that plagues 4 out of the 5 largest cable providers today. Donald Chew, On-Time CEO states that “the campaign will begin on Thursday, Oct. 8 and run for 40 days ending November 15, 2015.” In addition to a video discussing the MOTI device and the problem it solves, there will be plenty of ways for people all over the world to contribute and participate.
“We are determined to raise more funds than ever for the development of our game changing device,” says the company’s CEO, Donald Chew. “We invite everyone who has been frustrated with their cable service, anyone interested in making a difference in the cable industry, and anyone who is tired of the same old companies. The end product is simply seeing some amazing technology which actually solves a major problem. Every dollar counts and we need your help.”
The company’s goal is to raise more than $2,500,000 during this campaign. They’re asking everyone to get involved and, “Take Charge, Be different™.” Anyone interested in participating is asked to contact On-Time CEO, Donald Chew at 312-857-8569 or email at ceo@ontimecommunications.co. Contributions can be made on the Indiegogo site. Visit the On-time communications website and click the link to support the campaign: www.ontimecommunications.co.
About On-Time Communications, dba. On-Time Cable
On-Time is a profit company dedicated organization dedicated to creating competition in the cable industry. The organization provides customers a chance to have a true voice. Founded in 2013 by Donald Chew who was inspired by the struggles of millions who were being abused and ignored by the larger cable companies. Learn how you can get involved and help by visiting our website and clicking on the support our campaign link.
